item.title: Trump rips report saying his team may water down tariffs, the centerpiece of his re-election campaign
item.description: Sources told the Washington Post that preliminary discussions on tariffs have focused on certain sectors deemed key to national or economic security.

item.title: An AI-powered robot vacuum that can pick up your dirty socks and take pictures of your dog is one of the early stars of CES 2025
item.description: Roborock’s Saros Z70 comes with AI and a robotic arm.

item.title: Klarna CEO says he feels ‘gloomy’ because AI is developing so quickly it’ll soon be able to do his entire job
item.description: “My work to me is a super important part of who I am,” Sebastian Siemiatowski said.

item.title: The truth about how many transgender kids are using hormones and puberty blockers, according to a new study
item.description: The study finds that despite fears of their over-medicalization, transgender adolescents are only very rarely prescribed hormones and puberty blockers...
